chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: King Easar Togita, p. 19 (5)—King of Shienar. He has a square face, and white hair in a topknot. He is a head shorter than Paitar of Arafel. Sadness is a permanent presence in his eyes. His third son is married to Ethenielle's daughter. His wife died about eleven years ago.
